chapters.title: Chapter 18:  News for the Dragon
chapters.info: Alsalam Saeed Almadar, p. 391—King of Arad Doman and High Seat of House Almadar. He has been a good ruler for over twenty years, though the Council has recently smuggled him out of Bandar Eban—after leaving the city, he seems to have taken on the notion that he is the Rebirth of Artur Hawkwing.
